meta.title: Contact | Start a Conversation
meta.description: Start a conversation about your digital infrastructure needs. Qualification form for serious inquiries.

hero.title: Start a Conversation
hero.subtitle: Not a generic contact form—a qualification process

intro.title: Before we talk
intro.description: This form helps us understand your situation before we speak. The more context you provide, the more useful our initial conversation will be. We respond to all qualified inquiries within 48 hours.

timeline.label: Timeline
timeline.placeholder: When do you want to start?

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your situation, challenges, and goals. The more context, the better.

success.title: Inquiry Received
success.description: Thank you for your detailed inquiry. We'll review your information and respond within 48 hours with next steps.

aside.title: What happens next?
steps: We review your inquiry and assess fit
If qualified, we schedule a 30-minute discovery call
We provide an initial assessment and recommendations
If mutual fit, we scope a formal engagement
aside.note: We don't take every project. We focus on clients where we can deliver meaningful impact and maintain the quality of our work.
